statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, work_shift FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_day = '2022-11-15';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, work_day FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_shift = 'Morning';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_assignment LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT DISTINCT work_shift FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY work_shift DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_shift = 'Morning' ORDER BY work_day DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_day, work_shift FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_day BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT work_shift FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_name LIKE 'John%' AND work_day >= '2022-02-15' ORDER BY work_shift;
SELECT employee_id, work_day, work_assignment FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_day = '2022-03-20' AND work_shift IN ('Morning', 'Evening') ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_shift, work_day, work_assignment FROM employee_schedule WHERE work_assignment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY work_day ASC, work_shift DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, date FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_assignment WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM work_assignment GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, task_id FROM work_assignment WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_id = 1 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, employee_id, date FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, task_id FROM work_assignment WHERE date = '2021-12-01' AND employee_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM work_assignment WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT id, employee_id FROM employee_schedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-11-01' AND '2021-11-30';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, schedule_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM WorkAssignment WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT workstation_id, workstation_name, location FROM Workstation WHERE workstation_name LIKE '%Production%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT assignment_id, employee_id, workstation_id FROM WorkAssignment WHERE assignment_date <= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.schedule_date, w.workstation_name FROM EmployeeSchedule e INNER JOIN WorkAssignment wa ON e.employee_id = wa.employee_id INNER JOIN Workstation w ON wa.workstation_id = w.workstation_id WHERE e.schedule_date = '2022-06-20';
SELECT MAX(shift_start_time) AS latest_start_time FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM WorkAssignment WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM work_assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM work_assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY department_name;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 12345 ORDER BY shift_start_time;
SELECT full_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT department_id, name, location FROM department WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name, description FROM task WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, position FROM employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employee WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department.name, employee.first_name, employee.last_name FROM department JOIN employee ON department.manager_id = employee.employee_id;
SELECT task_name, description FROM task WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY task_name DESC;

SELECT employee.first_name, employee.last_name, shift.start_time, shift.end_time FROM employee JOIN assignment ON employee.employee_id = assignment.employee_id JOIN shift ON assignment.shift_id = shift.shift_id;
